data.prayer: Oh Lord, show the fatherless in the county of Pithoragarh that you can be their real Father.
data.verse: I will be to you a Father. you will be to me sons and daughters,’ says the Lord Almighty.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Pithoragarh, Uttarakhand, India
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, put your Bible in the hands of the 472,217, who are far from you and live in this place.
data.verse: How can a young person stay on the path of purity? By living according to your Word. I seek you with all my heart; do not let me stray from your commands.

data.prayer: Father, please reward those who diligently seek you with a heart of faith in the county of Pithoragarh.
data.verse: Without faith it is impossible to be well pleasing to him, for he who comes to God must believe that he exists, and that he is a rewarder of those who seek him.

data.prayer: Father, move the 5,317 believers in the county of Pithoragarh to say "Not our will, but yours be done", like Jesus.
data.verse: He withdrew about a stone’s throw beyond them, knelt down and prayed, "Father, if you are willing, take this cup from me; yet not my will, but yours be done."

data.prayer: Spirit, I pray that the Jogi Kanphata (Hindu traditions) people will come and worship before you, Lord. May they glorify your name for you are great.
Jesus, help the local leaders in Pithoragarh, Uttarakhand, India not be proud but humble, and willing to wash the feet of all they serve.
data.verse: “You call me ‘Teacher’ and ‘Lord,’ and rightly so, for that is what I am. Now that I, your Lord and Teacher, have washed your feet, you also should wash one another’s feet. I have set you an example that you should do as I have done for you.

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the county of Pithoragarh to agree with you in prayer.
data.verse: I [Jesus] pray also for those who will believe in me through their message, that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.prayer: Father, as people seek answers on the internet, please help them find the gospel in Pithoragarh, Uttarakhand, India.
data.verse: So I say to you, ask, and it will be given to you; seek, and you will find; knock, and it will be opened to you.

location.name: Pithoragarh
location.people_groups_list: Badhai (Muslim traditions), Tharu Rana, Kayastha (Muslim traditions), Brahmin Upreti, Rajput Chandrabansi
